**Overview**

This dashboard provides an insightful analysis of Endpoint Data Loss Prevention (DLP) events. It features bar charts for actions, file types, severity, and channels, pie charts for device types, and metrics for total DLP dictionary and engine hits. It also includes a line chart for tracking DLP events over time and a table listing the top 10 rule names. These visualizations help monitor, analyze, and respond to potential data loss incidents effectively.

[**Integrations Page**](/app/integrations/detail/zscaler_zia/overview)
